EmailTemplate.description: How to tag products in SFDC
EmailTemplate.name: DYK5 Tagging Products
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how to tag products in salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tagging prodcuts in salesforce.com
The following FMS products and services are available as distinct products in salesforce.com. In order to more accurately track product level pipeline and performance, please make sure to properly identify each opportunity in salesforce.com.
Download the instructions on "Tracking Product Pipeline Information in salesforce.com" http://ride/FMSMarCom/Product_Central/Docs/FMSProductTrackingSFDC.pdf , this document shows how to easily identify the following opportunities in salesforce.com:
FMS to DCC conversion Fleet Plan On-site STAR RPM Flex-to-Green (coming soon) Insurance RydeSmart Please help us track these products by identifying them in Salesforce.com!
For additional information on the products, please visit Product Central http://ride/FMSMarCom/Product_Central/index.html or contact the product managers listed below.
Fleet-Plan, Flex-To-Green: Kiran Sharma, Kiran_Sharma@ryder.com
On-site, RPM, Insurance: Calvin Marshall, Calvin_Marhsall@ryder.com
FMS to DCC Conversions, STAR: Katie McCormick, Katie_McCormick@ryder.com
RydeSmart: David Kidd, David_E_Kidd@ryder.com
